column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Citrus french toast best item we had
column2: nice thick toast with a great goat cheese and honey spread.  It also came with some maple syrup but didn't need it.  The meatballs were delicious
column3: and the sauce was great on the free bread.  Paella is large and takes time
column4: but seems to be worth it if you know that's something you like.  Skip the papas bravas
column5: looks tasty but the seasoning and the aioli are both bland.
